alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper; Dorchester; Inland Berkeley; Inland Colleton; Inland Jasper; Tidal Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 01 at 3:39PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Georgia and southeast South Carolina, including the following areas, in southeast Georgia, Coastal Chatham and Inland Chatham. In southeast South Carolina, Beaufort, Charleston, Coastal Colleton, Coastal Jasper, Dorchester, Inland Berkeley, Inland Colleton, Inland Jasper and Tidal Berkeley. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Rainfall amounts of 2 to 4 inches with localized higher amounts will be possible through tonight as weak low pressure impacts the area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper; Dorchester; Inland Berkeley; Inland Colleton; Inland Jasper; Tidal Berkeley
